title: Himitsukessha Taka no Tsume THE PLANETARIUM: Burabura! Black Hole no Nazo
original_name: 秘密結社鷹の爪 THE PLANETARIUM
sinopse: As the secret society, Eagle Talon, was planning world domination as always, a scream sounded from the kitchen! Instead of dinner, combat chief Yoshida-kun somehow ended up making a black hole! The hero of justice Deluxe Fighter joins the fray for some reason, and they all decide to go to outer space to see a real black hole! What could be awaiting them there? What is the mysterious link between blackholes and mankind?
